document_name: Minutes of the 1st Project Board Meeting 10 July 2012.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/LAO/00060492/Minutes of the 1st Project Board Meeting 10 July 2012.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
By the end of the Project, food insecurity resulting from climate change in Lao PDR minimized and vulnerability of farmers to extreme flooding and drought events reduced.

Specific Outputs:
1] Improved knowledge base on climate change impacts, 2] strengthened capacities of sectoral planners and agricultural producers to understand and address climate change, 3] demonstrated community-based adaptive agricultural practices, and 4] an adaptation monitoring and learning process for futher project up-scaling and replication.

project_descr: Improving the Resilience of the Agriculture Sector in Lao PDR to Climate Change Impacts: Improve knowledge on climate change, strengthen agriculture/rural sector policies for adaptation planning and introduce adaptive agricultural practices.
